name: Yogesh Kasar
label: Data Analyst
summary: Data Analyst with 1.8 years of experience in building ETL pipelines, analyzing large datasets, and creating interactive dashboards for business decision-making. Skilled in SQL (Snowflake, MySQL), Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn), and Power BI. Experienced in automate Data Profiling using Snowflake Python. Strong background in data quality improvement, performance tuning, and collaborating cross-functionally to meet tight project deadlines.

work_experience.summary: Data Analyst specializing in SQL, Snowflake, Python, and Power BI. Optimized data retrieval, automated ETL processes, and built interactive dashboards to drive business insights and efficiency.
highlights: Developed and optimized SQL queries in Snowflake and MySQL, improving data retrieval efficiency by 35% for reporting and analysis tasks.
Automated data cleaning and transformation tasks using Python, reducing manual effort by 40% and increasing team productivity.
Built ETL processes for structured data using SQL and Snowflake, resulting in a 30% improvement in data accuracy and consistency.
Generated interactive Power BI dashboards for key business metrics, enabling real-time insights, improving stakeholder decision-making, and reducing report turnaround time by 50%.
Performed data analysis using MongoDB, enabling better insights into semi structured data and improving reporting speed by 25%.
Used AWS S3 for storing and organizing data files, enabling seamless access and reducing local storage dependency by 60%.
Collaborated with business teams to automate manual reports in Power BI and Python, cutting reporting time by 45% and improving data reliability.
